name: Retro Rocket
description: Retro Rocket is an oscilloscope-themed robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box and retro console buttons, this robot exudes a nostalgic charm. Its rocket arms and legs allow it to move swiftly through any terrain, evoking a sense of adventure. Although its screen is broken, Retro Rocket compensates for it by wearing stylish shades. This unique combination of traits makes Retro Rocket a standout member of the WebtrES club.
